warezcdn.name: Isekai Maou to Shoukan Shoujo no Dorei Majutsu
warezcdn.title: Isekai Mao to Shokan Shojo no Dorei Majutsu

imdb.title: Isekai Mao to Shokan Shojo no Dorei Majutsu
imdb.plot: An elite player is summoned by two maidens to save a fantasy game.

episodes.title: Head Priest
episodes.plot: Diablo inadvertently rescues the priestess Lumachina Weselia from an assassination attempt. As Lumachina had been praying when Diablo appeared she now believes Diablo is God. Lumachina believes the Head Cardinal of her church wants her dead for investigating his corruption, so she had been looking for Head Paladin Batutta for his assistance. Diablo agrees to escort her to Zircon Tower together with Shera and Rem, as he remembers that his dungeon he built in the game is also located there.

episodes.title: Head Paladin
episodes.plot: When the group arrives in Zircon Tower City, a child named Horn offers to be a guide to the dungeon; the description confirms it is Diablo's dungeon. Later, a monstrous sand whale attacks the city and Diablo tries to fight it, but requires the help of Batutta and the city's leader, Fanis Laminitus.

episodes.title: Corrupt Ritual
episodes.plot: Lumachina and Rem are drugged and abducted by Batutta and his maid, Shiliu. Horn spied on them and warns Diablo and Shera.

episodes.title: Personal Domain
episodes.plot: The group arrives at Diablo's dungeon and have to go through several rooms filled with mazes, monsters and lava.

episodes.title: Black Dragon Clash
episodes.plot: Diablo saves an unconscious Horn and sacrifices his shirt and cape to make a fire. Rem, Shera, and Lumachina get through several floors of the dungeon only to run into Gewalt, who attacks them. They are interrupted by a massive black dragon who attacks them all.

episodes.title: Demon Lord Army
episodes.plot: Zircon Tower City's defenders are no match for Varakness' army. Varakness attempts to force Fanis to marry him. Diablo takes offense to Varakness saying he is working for a Demon Lord, so his group, including Rose, teleport to the battle. Diablo, Shera, Rem, and Rose then battle the army while Lumachina heals the injured with Horn assisting her.

episodes.title: Little Demon Lord
episodes.plot: Lumachina decides to go to the Royal Capital to root out the corruption of the Church, but first the group returns to Faltra City. While Lumachina visits the city's church, Diablo and Rose learn that Edelgard works at a bakery with Klem and Celestine as the usual customers. Klem warns Diablo that she senses something powerful in the Royal Capital. A criminal organization led by the Measmos family has been pressuring the bakery owner to pay protection money. When some Measmos enforcers come and ruin Klem's meal of biscuits, she beats them up and leads Edelgard, Diablo,...

episodes.title: Visit to the Royal Capital
episodes.plot: The group arrives at the Royal Capital, Sevenwall, and are accosted by guards, but Alicia arrives and dismisses the guards, then lets them into an inn she owns. As they eat, Horn says she wants to be stronger. Rose presents a slave collar and says if Horn wears it and makes a Master-Servant contract with Diablo, his power will flow into her, but Rem and Shera warn that if Diablo dies, she will die, plus other demerits of wearing a collar. After explaining to Alicia what is going on, she agrees to investigate the Head Cardinal, Vishos, but warns that the Law cannot ...

episodes.title: Storm the Church
episodes.plot: Lumachina is separated from the others and sentenced to execution. Diablo orders the others not to escape because Lumachina asked them not to. Horn inadvertently activates the Holy Grail she took from Diablo's dungeon and a tiny fairy-like girl named Babylon appears. She explains she appears to those who offer blood to the Grail. Babylon offers to make Horn stronger, but her spell doesn't work. With little options left, Horn puts on the collar.

episodes.title: Pretend God
episodes.plot: Vishos merges with Europa and boasts that he is a God, then starts smashing the church while trying to kill Lumachina. Diablo learns he is protected by a force field, so he asks Lumachina to cast Dispel to destroy the force field, but must protect her as it takes a long time to cast.

episodes.title: The Demon Lord Act
episodes.plot: Takuma Sakamoto was a shut-in gamer who achieved renown as the Demon Lord in Cross Reverie, a MMORPG, for his overwhelming gear and skill.

episodes.title: The Strongest Newcomer
episodes.plot: After awaking to hands filled with breasts, Diablo follows Shera and Rem to register as new members of the Adventurer's Guild. While Shera is identified as a level 30 Summoner by the guild, Diablo's level proves too high for them to measure.

episodes.title: Fallen Assault
episodes.plot: The Warrior Emile, defender and ally of all women, challenges Diablo to a fight.

episodes.title: Point-Blank War Dance
episodes.plot: Rem, Celestine, and even Emile struggle in their battle against Gregore's sudden attack. Meanwhile, Diablo and Edelgard confront each other on the Bridge of Ulug.

episodes.title: Imperial Knight
episodes.plot: The Kingdom of Greenwood demands that Faltra City hand over Princess Shera. If they refuse, it will lead to war, so Diablo meets with Galford, the Lord of Faltra City, and accepts a quest to prevent war from breaking out.

episodes.title: Slave Market
episodes.plot: While Greenwood's demands remain unmet, Diablo and the girls visit a slave market to see if they can learn the magical secret of the Enslavement Collars.

episodes.title: Change of Heart
episodes.plot: The following day after Prince Keera's visit, Shera suddenly bids farewell to Diablo while they're preparing potions. Unable to stop her from leaving, Diablo holes up in the inn, consumed with regret. Rem is unsettled to see him so negative, too.

episodes.title: Hero's Charge
episodes.plot: Diablo squares off with Prince Keera's Summon, the Force Hydra, a monster he has never faced before.

episodes.title: Holy Knight Tale
episodes.plot: Alicia returns to the Imperial Capital to give her report on the incident between Faltra and the Kingdom of Greenwood. There she encounters the Paladin, Saddler.

episodes.title: The Demon Lord's Resurrection
episodes.plot: The night of the Demon Lord's resurrection arrives at long last. Rem finally reveals to Shera and Alicia that the Demon Lord Krebskulm's soul is sealed within her. Together, Diablo's party heads for Starfall Tower, where Edelgard awaits.

episodes.title: The Young Girl Awakens
episodes.plot: Diablo's party returns to Faltra with the newly resurrected Klem. On their way back from visiting Celestine, Rem and Klem suddenly get separated from Diablo and Shera, with Alicia having led them both astray.

episodes.title: Battle for Legitimacy
episodes.plot: The Demon Lord Krebskulm has awakened due to Alicia's betrayal. Diablo stands alone against Klem, her mind consumed by hatred. Shera races to Rem's side. An army of Fallen led by Edelgard marches on Faltra, and the curtain rises on their final battle.
